title: Carbon Monoxide Explainer: Why Would Pro Cyclists Inhale the Gas and Why Does the UCI Want to Stop Them?
content:
UCI calls for ban on controversial use of carbon monoxide after revelations that Tour de France-toppers Visma-Lease a Bike and UAE Emirates were tinkering with the toxic gas.

Read the full article at Carbon Monoxide Explainer: Why Would Pro Cyclists Inhale the Gas and Why Does the UCI Want to Stop Them? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
